mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEMPORARY ( TEMP_NO, TEMP_TITLE, TEMP_DESC, TARGET_AMOUNT, FUND_START_DATE, FUND_END_DATE, CATEGORY, SHIP_START_DATE, USER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_TEMP_NO.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{summary}, #{targetAmount}, #{fundStartDate}, #{fundEndDate}, #{category}, #{shipStartDate}, #{userNo} )
